alert.note: Alert for Cooke; Grayson (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 15 at 8:29PM CDT until June 15 at 9:30PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: The National Weather Service in Fort Worth has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Cooke County in north central Texas... Grayson County in north central Texas... * Until 930 PM CDT. * At 828 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Whitesboro, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...65 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Sherman, Whitesboro, Denison, Van Alstyne, Howe, Pottsboro, Collinsville, Whitewright, Gunter, Bells, Tom Bean, Callisburg, Knollwood, Dorchester, Randell Lake, Eisenhower State Park, Lake Texoma, Valley Lake, Preston and Southmayd. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...65 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for north central Texas. For your protection get inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
